DOC.brief_summary: High density lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDL-C ) centrum process reverse cholesterol transport peripheral cell liver [ 10 ] . HDL-C promotes endothelial generation nitric oxide ( NO ) improve endothelial function arterial vasoreactivity [ 11 ] . In several study , low HDL-C level report associate increased coronary artery disease ( CAD ) risk [ 12-14 ] . HDL-C also anti- inflammatory anti-oxidant activity [ 15,16 ] . Concerning anti-inflammatory activity , HDL-C inhibit activation monocytes/macrophages neutrophils [ 17,18 ] inhibits expression endothelial adhesion molecule , vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 ( VCAM-1 ) E-selectin [ 15 ] . In study aim investigate relation HDL-C level systemic inflammatory marker patient cardiac syndrome X ( CSX ) .
DOC.criteria: Must able get exercise stress test Must able coronary angiography Clinical diagnosis typical anginaduring rest effort Abnormal test result exercise ECG myocardial perfusion scintigraphy Must angiographically normal epicardial coronary artery Patients valvular heart disease ( mitral stenosis moderate severe mitral regurgitation Patients moderate severe aortic stenosis regurgitation include mitral annular calcification ) Patients heart failure ( left ventricular ejection fraction < 50 % ) Patients congenital heart disease , cardiomyopathy , leave ventricular hypertrophy , right ventricular hypertrophy Patients cardiac surgery Patients thyroid disease Patients anemia Patients pulmonary disease Patients infectious disease ( locally systemic )
